QuestData.Title: Surwich
QuestData.Description: Other than what you've seen, the Portal's been surprisingly quiet. There isn't much more work I can give to you, I'm afraid.$b$bIf you're looking for trouble, you might try the Gilnean fishing village to the southwest. Surwich, I think it was.$b$bI know we're supposed to be friends with the Gilneans, but really? Worgen? I had enough trouble getting used to the draenei.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Mayor Charlton Connisport at Surwich in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Surwich, $r. Please, have a look around.
